design.appearanceSpecification: The applet features a clean and vibrant design with a yellow and green color scheme, evoking the natural colors of a banana. The layout is simple and intuitive, focusing on presenting information clearly. Text elements are easily readable, and the overall aesthetic is friendly and engaging.
design.blueprint:
- App Title
- Banana Fact Display
- Image Display
- Navigation Buttons (Next Fact, Previous Fact)
design.functionalitySpecification:
The applet will display interesting facts about bananas. 
Workflow:
1. Upon opening the applet, a title "Banana Facts!" is displayed at the top.
2. A random banana fact is presented to the user in a text element.
3. An image of a banana is displayed below the fact.
4. Two buttons are present at the bottom: "Next Fact" and "Previous Fact".
5. Tapping "Next Fact" will load and display a new, random banana fact and its associated image.
6. Tapping "Previous Fact" will display the fact and image that was shown before the current one. The applet will cycle through facts. If there are no previous facts, the "Previous Fact" button will be disabled or show the first fact again.
